r.d:
The PEAR::Auth package provides methods for creating an authentication system using PHP.
Currently it supports the following storage containers to read/write the login data:
* All databases supported by the PEAR database layer * All databases supported by the MDB database layer * All databases supported by the MDB2 database layer * Plaintext files * LDAP servers * POP3 servers * IMAP servers * vpopmail accounts * RADIUS * SAMBA password files * SOAP * PEAR website
